sentences.cn: 然而他非要把利奥·塔克西尔先生的《耶酥传》寄给我不可.

sentences.en: California is vying with other states to capture a piece of the growing communications market.
sentences.cn: 加州正在与各州竞争，以求在不断扩大的通讯市场上获得份额。

sentences.en: Early settlement request vie our mutual interest otherwise may lose buyer.
sentences.cn: 鉴于彼此的利益,望早日获得解决,否则会失去客户.

sentences.en: Foster will vie with Green and James for England action on Wednesday in Amsterdam.
sentences.cn: 福斯特周三在阿姆斯特丹将与詹姆斯和格林争夺位置.

sentences.en: In hospitals, business plans vie with patients for doctors' attention.
sentences.cn: 在医院，经营方针和病人都是医生所要关心的。

sentences.en: In my opinion, few fruit, can vie with the apple.
sentences.cn: 我认为很少有其它水果能与苹果相匹敌.

sentences.en: In the garden flowers vie with each other in beauty.

sentences.en: Moi jamais, se disait - elle , je ne vivrai cette vie - l à.
sentences.cn: 她自言自语, 我绝不,绝不过这样的生活.

sentences.en: Par mauvaise compagnie, enfants suivent mauvaise vie.
sentences.cn: 以眼还眼, 以牙还牙.

sentences.en: People vie with each other in making special purchases for Spring Festival.
sentences.cn: 春节快到了,大家在竞购年货.

sentences.en: Plaisir d'amour ne dure qu'un moment, chagrin d'amour dure toute la vie.
sentences.cn: 爱的快乐只存在一时, 而爱的悲伤却残留一世.

sentences.en: She stood up obediently and went back to her room with a happy Vie.
sentences.cn: 她听了我这话,就站了起来,很喜欢的回到她的房里去睡了.

sentences.en: The organization was established in 1960 and is headquartered in Vie a, Austria.

sentences.en: Vie Furniture has a great combination of traditional style and contemporary design.
sentences.cn: 人生家具有很大的结合,传统风格和现代设计.

sentences.en: You have your point of vie, and I have mine.
sentences.cn: 你有你的观点, 我有我的观点.

trans.tran_en: to compete very hard with someone in order to get something
